ability.swordinthestone.alchemist.descri:
Inflicts a negative status effect on hit occasionally
Grants the user a positive status effect on kill occasionally
ability.swordinthestone.alchemist.title: Chemical %1$s
ability.swordinthestone.bat_swarm.descri: Right click to ride a swarm of bats that attacks mobs
ability.swordinthestone.bat_swarm.name: %1$s's %2$s
ability.swordinthestone.bat_swarm.title: Unholy %1$s
ability.swordinthestone.double_jump.desc:
While holding, tap space in the air to double jump
Fall damage is reduced while holding
ability.swordinthestone.ender_rift.descr:
Hold right click and move your mouse to move an orb
Release to teleport to the orb
ability.swordinthestone.ender_rift.title: Unstable %1$s
ability.swordinthestone.fireball.descrip: Hold right click to charge up a fireball attack
ability.swordinthestone.fireball.title: Flaming %1$s
ability.swordinthestone.thunder_smite.de:
Sword charges when attacking mobs
Strikes mobs with lightning when fully charged
ability.swordinthestone.toxic_dash.descr: Slash forward on right click leaving behind a poisonous cloud
ability.swordinthestone.toxic_dash.title: Toxic %1$s
ability.swordinthestone.vampiric.descrip: Gain 0-2 hearts upon killing a mob
ability.swordinthestone.vampiric.title: Vampiric %1$s
